sect1.title: Webget
sect1.para: Webget is a web-based utility for downloading Rivendell audio content from remote locations. It can be accessed at http://host-name/rd-bin/webget.html, where host-name is the host name or IP address of the Rivendell system.

Content in Webget is searched for on the basis of the Cart's Title field. The format of the downloaded audio can be specified. Credentials for a valid Rivendell user that has the Production Rights/Allow WebGet Login priviledge enabled in rdadmin1 must be provided. Click the OK button to generate the audio.
sect1.note: If multiple carts with the specified title exist, then the cart with the lowest Cart Number will be used.
If the selected cart contains multiple cuts, then the cut with the lowest Cut Number will be used.
